record.dc:title: Mill Creek
record.dc:description: Mill Creek, now known as LeConte Creek, referred to both a creek and a community. Here we see some of the residents' homes and farms. According to Lucinda Oakley Ogle, there were at least nineteen homesteads located on the creek and its tributaries.
